Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン…… 試練の答がようやく出た……
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune... I finally have the answer for my trial...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはオレに聞いたな…… オレの隣にいるのは誰か、と。
Entry.EnglishText: You asked me...who it was that was by my side.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの時、オレは、アガーテの姿をした クレアの事を、「クレアだ」と答えた。
Entry.EnglishText: At that time, I answered that Claire, who looked like Agarte, was "Claire."

Entry.JapaneseText: そう自分に言い聞かせようとしていた。 おまえはオレの迷いを見抜いていた……
Entry.EnglishText: That's what I was trying to tell myself, at least. You saw through my hesitation, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今なら、迷う事なく言える…… ここにいるのは……アガーテだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now, though, I can say this without any doubts... The one by my side...is Agarte.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアの姿をしていても、 その心は<Red>アガーテ<White>なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even though she looks like Claire, she possesses <Red>Agarte<White>'s heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それだけか？ 本当にこれでいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...That's it? Are you really fine with that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくは答を用意していたわけじゃない。 キミが見つけ、信じる事こそが答なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not the one who has answers for you. Those are what you yourself find and believe.

Entry.JapaneseText: その答が正しいかどうかは、 キミたち自身の手で確かめればいいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: You should figure it out for yourselves if that answer is the correct one.

Entry.JapaneseText: わからない！ でも……何かおかしい……
確かめるんだ！ 早く、ぼくに乗って!!
Entry.EnglishText: We need to check this out! Quick, get on me!
